trans-unit.source: Add Azure SQL DB Elastic Scale References to a Visual Studio Project
trans-unit.target: Add Azure SQL DB Elastic Scale References to a Visual Studio Project

trans-unit.source: How to add .NET references for Elastic Scale APIs to Visual Studio projects using Nuget.
trans-unit.target: How to add .NET references for Elastic Scale APIs to Visual Studio projects using Nuget.

trans-unit.source: How to: add Elastic Database client library references to a Visual Studio project
trans-unit.target: How to: add Elastic Database client library references to a Visual Studio project

trans-unit.source: Install [NuGet Visual Studio Extension Gallery](http://docs.nuget.org/docs/start-here/installing-nuget) for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Install [NuGet Visual Studio Extension Gallery](http://docs.nuget.org/docs/start-here/installing-nuget) for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: To add an elastic database client library reference in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: To add an elastic database client library reference in Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Open an existing project, or create a new project using the New Project dialog box located at **File** --> **New** --> **Project**
trans-unit.target: Open an existing project, or create a new project using the New Project dialog box located at **File** --> **New** --> **Project**

trans-unit.source: In the Solution Explorer, right-click on **References** and select **Manage NuGet Packages**
trans-unit.target: In the Solution Explorer, right-click on **References** and select **Manage NuGet Packages**

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the left-hand side of the Manage NuGet Packages window, select **Online** and then **nuget.org** or “All”
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the left-hand side of the Manage NuGet Packages window, select **Online** and then **nuget.org** or “All”

trans-unit.source: In the **Search Online** dialog box, type **Elastic Database**, select the **Elastic Database client library** and click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Search Online** dialog box, type **Elastic Database**, select the **Elastic Database client library** and click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: Review the license, and click **I Accept**.
trans-unit.target: Review the license, and click **I Accept**.

trans-unit.source: The client library reference has now been added to your project.
trans-unit.target: The client library reference has now been added to your project.
